page.title: 09COMBREW FARM BARNSTAPLE.
page.content: In our D-block there is a{farm}called {Combrew}farm.Part of the{farmer's}job entails growing silage to feed his 115 milking cows,20 two year old heifers, and 21 calves. The{farmer}has 130 acres of land. The size of the fields vary from 7_12 acres. The{farm}house is near to his fields.The machinery he uses are tractors,manure and fertiliser spreaders. The{farm}is a family{farm}and has been in the family for some generations.It has 1 part time staff. The{farm}yard has 2 old barns and 3 new sheds. We asked the{farmer's}wife what she enjoyed about{farming}she said that she liked the outdoor life.
